member.name: IWICBitmapClipper.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the bitmap clipper with the provided parameters.
member.param: The rectangle of the bitmap source to clip.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapClipper
member.summary: Exposes methods that produce a clipped version of the input bitmap for a specified rectangular region of interest.
